text: Anatai(p penkalait tirumanam ceytu avar)kalitam ninkal niyayamaka natakka mutiyatu enru payantirkalanal, unkalukkup pitittamana penkalai manantu kollunkal - irantirantakavo, mum'munrakavo, nannankavo. Anal, ninkal (ivarkalitaiye) niyayamaka natakka mutiyatu enru payantal, oru pennaiye (manantu kollunkal), allatu unkal valakkarankalukkuc contamana (or atimaip pennaik kontu) potumakkik kollunkal - ituve ninkal aniyayam ceyyamaliruppatarkuc culapamana muraiyakum
